titleStmt.title: A new voyage to Italy with a description of the chief towns, churches, tombs, libraries, palaces, statues, and antiquities of that country : together with useful instructions for those who shall travel thither / by Maximilian Mission ; done into English and adorned with figures.
Nouveau voyage d'Italie. English
titleStmt.author: Misson, Maximilien, 1650?-1722.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
